name: tm67
effect: Teaches Recycle to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Retaliate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Recycle)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. The attack never misses.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. The attack never misses.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. The attack never misses.
